text: sillo neohuineun hananim oee usang-eul sungbaehago geojis-eul kkumigo iss eul ppun-ila hananim oee neohuiga sung baehaneun geosdeul-eun neohuiege il-yonghal yangsig-eul jul neunglyeog-i eobsnola geuleobeu lo hananimkke il-yonghal yangsig-eul guha la geuligo geubunkke gamsahala neohui moduga geubunkkelo dol-aganila
